qtext: 2 Why would you want to change your original AWS architecture?
qexplanation: When AWS releases a new service you might want to reconsider your original architecture based on the cost benefits, scalability benefits or availability benefits from using this new AWS service

qtext: 2 Which of the following is not a general design principle for architecting solutions that provide performance efficiency on AWS?

qanswers.atext: Use the right tool for the task

qexplanation: Use AWS Lambda is not a general design principle for architecting for performance on AWS. General design principles for architecting for performance on AWS are - Go Global, Use the right tool for the task, experiment often and use new technologies.
